attributes.action: encourage industry, by use of taxation benefits, to make greater use of railways and canals for transportation of goods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Canals and Railways are a valuable resource under used for transporting goods within the U.K. Increased use could help reduce congestion on the road network and would be less damaging on the environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
